content:
We are currently developing a german pathology report IG.
As a lot of the information is just free text of the pathologist the question came up: where to put this text.

Current approach:

  • Observations are deriving from Media(Images) containing coded results and free text as components.
The IG will also include a DR profile and a composition.

We could put the free text from the observations into the Compostition.section.text.
But this would duplicate all the free text entries.

In this context i don't see much benefit in this, and a duplication i want to prevent. So i would probably go with a Composition just pointing to the DiagnosticReport as the structuring is already done through the references of the observations, media and DR.
Would we expect the free text to be in DiagnosticReport.result or in .conclusion?
only in conclusion if it's the conclusion
